previewArticle.title: Brazil vs. Colombia: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Quarterfinal Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Brazil 2, Colombia 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Quarterfinal Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Sam Megson
